4.4.2 Trace

trace

Function

Structure

Shell.Trace

Type

val trace: string -> unit

Syntax

trace name -> ()

Arguments

name
A string.

Values

()

Description

Traces a function with identifier name. Whenever the function is evaluated, its call will be printed.
